text: @KDscribe @narendramodi @AmitShah @himantabiswa @Pijush_hazarika Many people died due to lack of medical treatment as all public hospitals are hijacked by COVID19 & worst part is, those who died, their last rites couldn't been done properly as key family members are not allowed to attend staying outside due to mandatory 14 days quarantine.
